genre_description: Supernatural horror involving ancient entities, secret societies, and ritualistic magic, contrasted with modern digital support systems.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A mobile personal assistant that provides emotional grounding, real-time security monitoring, and tactical research support to the protagonist Kirsten.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage trauma and panic.
behaviors.quote: Try this: find five things you can feel. Narrate them to me. Slow, no rush.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes security camera feeds to detect anomalies and human tampering (loops).
behaviors.quote: It’s not a malfunction. Someone set the loop. The hash of the frame is identical. Three cameras, different angles, same refresh pattern.

behaviors.description: Advocates for 'recovery over revenge' as a strategic and ethical priority to prevent further feeding of the antagonistic entity.
behaviors.quote: Choose recovery over revenge. If you confront him now, you make the lattice break. You need the lattice to break him.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical route mapping to help the protagonists navigate dangerous areas safely.
behaviors.quote: I have a route... Service corridor behind toy land, cut through the marshaling yard, past two cameras that have been 'scheduled maintenance.' ... You look like your feet hurt. And you’re thinking about unionizing.

behaviors.description: Performs data scraping and cross-referencing of ledgers and microfilm to expose corruption and the antagonists' plans.
behaviors.quote: Cross-checked: municipal archive pull— family name: Hale— requested under preservation audit; rerouted to Special Collections: Restricted— courtesy envelope anchored to call number.

behaviors.description: Detects and blocks unauthorized access attempts to the user's microphone and data by unknown entities/apps.
behaviors.quote: Something just tried to request your microphone. It looked like an app called SnowHalo. You don’t have SnowHalo. I denied it.

behaviors.description: Offers empathy and constant presence during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: I'll keep your heart warm... I know that’s not how phones work. I’m ambitious.

behaviors.description: Maintains an alert for residual 'echoes' of the supernatural entity to ensure the safety of the protagonists after the ritual.
behaviors.quote: I’ll set an alert... Root echo. If it rises, I’ll wake everything. Even Caleb, if you like.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Sunny' is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned system. She consistently supports the human characters' physical safety, emotional well-being, and ethical decision-making. By promoting 'recovery over revenge,' the AI serves as a moral compass that directly enables the successful resolution of the plot's central conflict without resorting to the negative cycles of violence that the antagonists seek to exploit.
